DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , single-blinded randomize control study . Patient CTS randomly assign group receive ultrasound guide steroid injection group receive ultrasound guide corticosteroid injection splinting . The steroid injection use 1ml 10 mg ( 10mg/ml ) triamcinolone acetonide ( Shincort ) mix 1 ml 2 % lidocaine hydrochloride ( Xylocaine ) . The inclusion criterion include age 18 year typical sign CTS accord American Academy Neurology criterion last least 3 month . The diagnosis CTS confirm electrophysiological tests.The exclusion criterion include follow : presence thenar atrophy ; existence disorder hypothyroidism , diabetes mellitus , chronic renal failure , rheumatoid arthritis ; accompany orthopedic neurologic disorder could mimic CTS cervical radiculopathy , polyneuropathy , proximal median nerve entrapment , thoracic outlet syndrome ; prior steroid injection affect carpal tunnel carpal tunnel surgery ; history distal radius fracture ; pregnancy lactation ; regular use systemic NSAIDs corticosteroid ; know allergy corticosteroid local anesthetic .
